react

Class Value<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • react.Reactor<ValueView.Listener<T>>
      • react.AbstractValue<T>
        • react.Value<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ValueView<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IntValue

    public class Value<T>
extends AbstractValue<T>
    A container for a single value, which may be observed for changes.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class react.Reactor

        Reactor.RListener

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface react.ValueView

        ValueView.Listener<T>

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Value(T value)
      Creates an instance with the supplied starting value.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T> Value<T> create(T value)
      Convenience method for creating an instance with the supplied starting value.
      T get()
      Returns the current value.
      Slot<T> slot()
      Returns a slot which can be used to wire this value to the emissons of a Signal or another value.
      T update(T value)
      Updates this instance with the supplied value.
      T updateForce(T value)
      Updates this instance with the supplied value.

        public Value(T value)

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static <T> Value<T> create(T value)
        Convenience method for creating an instance with the supplied starting value.

      • update

        public T update(T value)
        Updates this instance with the supplied value. Registered listeners are notified only if the value differs from the current value, as determined via Object.equals(java.lang.Object).
        Returns:
        the previous value contained by this instance.

      • updateForce

        public T updateForce(T value)
        Updates this instance with the supplied value. Registered listeners are notified regardless of whether the new value is equal to the old value.
        Returns:
        the previous value contained by this instance.

      • slot

        public Slot<T> slot()
        Returns a slot which can be used to wire this value to the emissons of a Signal or another value.

      • get

        public T get()
        Description copied from interface: ValueView
        Returns the current value.
